MainNavigation.header-text: The best training in the comfort of your home.

hero.heading: You are stronger than you think
hero.paragraph: FIT – it's about being in shape via your health. My trainings will get you to your goal using exactly this path – being FIT and feeling great!

achievements.achievement_one: 2 x Overall World & European Champion in Fitness
achievements.achievement_two: 2 x Overall Arnold Classic Champion in Fitness
achievements.achievement_three: Artist of Cirque Du SOLEIL (22 years)

reasons.heading: My programs directions Women's Fitness online I created for us, beautiful women! WHY?
reasons.cardio_programs: Because we have time for everyone in the family except for us!
reasons.thematic_programs: You don't need to go anywhere, we will train in the cozy environment of your home, in a convenient for you time.
reasons.marathons: It's time to love yourself and dedicate yourself to your health 10-40 minutes a day
reasons.zone_training: All programs are different in time and content
reasons.intensives: Trainer's room in your house with full body training
reasons.programs_of_the_day: We train in quality and safety

cardio_programs.title: CARDIO programs
cardio_programs.description: 2 courses of cardio training, stimulating the heart and lungs. Smooth and not too heavy. Training for the heart and lungs, the heart and lungs, the heart and lungs

thematic_programs.title: THEMATIC training
thematic_programs.description: Several creative thematic complex training, which your body receives new stimulation. Positive changes in your body are guaranteed

marathons.title: MARATHONS
marathons.description: 2 courses of round training for the whole body. Level 1 and level 2. All training are absolutely different, all around, entertaining and effective. You get a lot of good and pleasure from training

zone_training.title: TRAINING BY ZONES
zone_training.description: Training course, in which the muscles are divided into zones. Each training is directed to the specific zone. More deep work of each group of muscles

intensives.title: INTENSIVE TRAINING
intensives.description: 6 most important topics, uncovered in the educational format. These intensive trainings provide you with a huge amount of rehabilitation information and exercises

programs_of_the_day.title: DAY PROGRAMS
programs_of_the_day.description: 2 courses of training programs ideal for those who want to start exercising and gradually move to the next level of complexity. With detailed explanations of the technique of execution.

carousel-items.name: TATIANA ROMAKH
carousel-items.review: I really liked the whole package of short lessons - just what you need for beginners. Depending on the availability of time, you can take one or more classes at once or do a circuit training. Thank you and looking forward to the next more advanced course!

carousel-items.name: OKSANA TKACHENKO
carousel-items.review: I went through the entire course and realized that the entire left side was not working well. Thank you very much for understanding your problems. I continue on!!! The whole program is excellent, I especially like the progressive level! I feel warm and comfortable with my ego. Everything is better! I like everything!

carousel-items.name: OLGA GEINITZ
carousel-items.review: I have been working with Alya for several months now. I had a whole bunch of problems due to injury, sedentary work and flat feet. Before, I did everything with the wrong technique, and the wrong muscles worked. Alya shows dozens of different ways how to do it right.

carousel-items.name: SRIA ENGH
carousel-items.review: Alya has changed my life - I am again able to go for long walks without experiencing pain in my knees. My level is a 40+ mom without sports training, and with Alya I not only become stronger, I even move differently. Thanks a lot!

carousel-items.name: INNA KARIAKINA
carousel-items.review: Hello, what you do is very valuable! I devote to training, usually 30 minutes a day, and the result is already visible not only in the mirror, but also on the scales. With minimal effort, losing 6 kg in three weeks is a very good result, I think. And most importantly, it is a pleasure to work with you!

carousel-items.name: OLGA SHRUB
carousel-items.review: Wonderful! Wonderful! Yesterday I did exercises with an elastic band - this is a workout for the whole body - my mood immediately improved. Charm! Such great and detailed explanations! Such coordination. And all this in 15 minutes! I didn't think I'd find this - it's fabulous!

form.heading: Questions? Let's solve them together!
form.paragraph: Fill out the form, and I will gladly answer all your questions about training, programs or anything else related to fitness. Together we will find the best solution for you 😊

ProgramPage.heading: My programs
ProgramPage.no-programs: Programs not found or not yet created...

SingleProgramPage.login-check: You need to log in or create an account to buy the course

accordion.question: Do the workouts take place at certain times?
accordion.answer: You can exercise when it’s convenient for you. You only need to set aside time during the day or evening and train regularly, repeating the exercises after the trainer and observing the correct execution technique.

accordion.question: I paid for the course, where can I access the course?
accordion.answer: Immediately after making the payment, the course will appear in your client area.

accordion.question: I forgot my password, what should I do?
accordion.answer: You can renew your password at any time on the Log in page (On the Log in page, select Forgot password?)

accordion.question: Can I exercise if I have health problems?
accordion.answer: The characteristics of your body are taken into account only in personal training. When exercising online, take into account the limitations of your body on your own, after consulting with your doctor, especially if you have acute inflammatory processes in the joints or problems of the cardiovascular system.

accordion.question: Is it possible to exercise during pregnancy or after childbirth?
accordion.answer: Most of the course exercises will be useful for both. But! This is not a SPECIALIZED course for pregnant women, as well as post-pregnancy recovery, so please consult your doctor first.

achievements.heading: Achievements
achievements.achievement-paragraph: Master of sport in bodybuilding • Master of sport in international class of gymnastics • Order of Honor of manhood III degree, Ukraine • PRO-fitness sportsman
achievements.award-paragraph: 2-time World Champion in Sports Acrobatics • 2-time Absolute World Champion in Fitness • 2-time Absolute Champion of Arnold Classic in Fitness • Absolute European Champion in Fitness • European Champion in Sports Acrobatics • World Games Champion in Fitness

career.heading: Career. SHOW BUSINESS CIRQUE DU SOLEIL
card-one-list: Artist/Acrobat at Cirque Du Soleil (21 years)
Stunt Actress in the film Wonder Woman 84
Stunt Actress in the film Oscar and the Lady in Pink
SAG Award for «Stunt Ensemble» in the film Wonder Woman 84
GRAMMY — Solo Performance representing The Beatles & Cirque Du Soleil
card-two-list: Show “LOVE” (show creation): Solo Number on Air Balloons
Show “TOTEM” (show creation): Solo Number on Gymnastic Rings, Adagio
Show “SALTIMBANKO” : Chinese Balloons, Balloons, Russian Ropes

circus.paragraph-one: My life is full of adventures and unexpected twists. But I always try to make the most of every turn.
circus.paragraph-two: Whether it's «through hardships to the stars» in sports or overcoming shyness and fear while performing on the Cirque Du Soleil stage in front of thousands… Whether it's training during shows and preparing for fitness championships after performances… Whether it's returning to aerial performance after giving birth to two daughters… Or recovering and regaining athletic functionality after undergoing several complex spinal and hip surgeries.

competitions.paragraph-one: All this life experience, gained not only theoretically but, most importantly, practically, I invest in creating my programs and courses.
competitions.paragraph-two: The rehabilitative component, corrective approach, creative thinking, and deep knowledge of my field make my programs unique, engaging, and, most importantly, BENEFICIAL in many ways.
competitions.paragraph-three: Training with me, you are in safe hands because I take care of everyone who has entrusted me with the most important thing you have — your health.
